entry.title: Awesome Scientific Computing Updates on Jul 23 - Jul 29, 2018
entry.content:
Basic linear algebra

  • BLAS - Standard building blocks for performing basic vector and matrix operations. (Fortran, public domain, GitHub (⭐1.7k))
  • LAPACK - Routines for solving systems of linear equations, linear least-squares, eigenvalue problems, etc. (Fortran, BSD, GitHub (⭐1.7k))

Multi-purpose toolkits

  • DUNE Numerics - Toolbox for solving PDEs with grid-based methods. (C++, GPL 2, GitLab)
  • SciPy - Python modules for statistics, optimization, integration, linear algebra, etc. (Python, mostly BSD, GitHub (⭐14k))
  • NumPy - Fundamental package needed for scientific computing with Python. (Python, BSD, GitHub (⭐30k))

Finite Elements

  • libMesh - Framework for the numerical simulation of PDEs using unstructured discretizations. (C++, LGPL 2.1, GitHub (⭐701))
  • deal.II - Software library supporting the creation of finite element codes. (C++, LGPL 2.1, GitHub (⭐1.5k))
  • Netgen/NGSolve - High performance multiphysics finite element software. (C++, LGPL 2.1, GitHub (⭐339))
  • Firedrake - Automated system for the solution of PDEs using the finite element method. (Python, LGPL 3, GitHub (⭐581))

Meshing / Triangular and tetrahedral meshing

  • Gmsh - Three-dimensional finite element mesh generator with pre- and post-processing facilities. (C++, GPL, GitLab)
  • MeshPy - Quality triangular and tetrahedral mesh generation. (Python, MIT, GitHub (⭐558))
  • CGAL - Algorithms for computational geometry. (C++, mixed LGPL/GPL, GitHub (⭐5.4k))
  • TetGen - Quality tetrahedral mesh generator and 3D Delaunay triangulator. (C++, AGPLv3)
  • distmesh - Simple generator for unstructured triangular and tetrahedral meshes. (MATLAB, GPL 3)

Sparse linear solvers / Mesh tools

  • SuperLU - Direct solution of large, sparse, nonsymmetric systems of linear equations. (C, mostly BSD, GitHub (⭐302))
  • PyAMG - Algebraic Multigrid Solvers in Python. (Python, MIT, GitHub (⭐612))

Other libraries and tools / Mesh tools

  • FFTW - Discrete Fourier transforms in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, real and complex. (C, GPL2, GitHub (⭐2.9k))
  • Qhull - Convex hull, Delaunay triangulation, Voronoi diagram, halfspace intersection about a point, etc. (C/C++, custom open source license, GitHub (⭐773))
  • GSL - Random number generators, special functions, and least-squares fitting etc. (C/C++, GPL 3, Savannah)
  • OpenFOAM - Free, open source CFD (computational fluid dynamics) software. (C++, GPL 3, GitHub (⭐1.8k))
  • FiPy - Finite-volume PDE solver. (Python, custom open-source license, GitHub (⭐560))
entry.summary: 21 awesome projects updated on Jul 23 - Jul 29, 2018
